posts.name: Justin Pierce
posts.cooked:
Similar to the REV tubing endcaps; We created a version of them that is made to be mass produced and 3d printed. They have the same outer profile to fit the inside of REV tubing. The inside of the new block is solid and all holes are modified to be thru holes for the usability to be preserved.

Respawn blocks.zip (3.5 MB) (soildworks parts)

Respawn blocks STL.zip (2.0 MB) (STL) Respawn Block 830×714 105 KB

Respawn Block 830×714 105 KB

Respawn Block 830×714 105 KB

posts.name: Rod
posts.cooked: Sorry, but could you post as a STL?  I can’t open that file format…

posts.name: Justin Pierce
posts.cooked: I put that in there now, thanks for seeing that.

posts.name: Nick.kremer
posts.cooked: May I suggest posting a CAD screenshot and/or irl picture for stuff like this? Not all of us have CAD at our fingertips all day.

posts.name: sanddrag
posts.cooked: Can we get a photo of an actual installation of this part and how it is used?

posts.name: Justin Pierce
posts.cooked: Sorry for the delay, been busy with kickoff preparations. But I have updated to post to now have a step by step pdf of how to install and use the Respawn Block.
